name: UPSC Mentorship and Guidance Course
description: Get personal mentorship from Mr. Pathi, an LBSNAA alumnus, in this intensive UPSC preparation program. This course offers strategic guidance, study planning, and motivation for aspirants who aim to secure a top rank in the Civil Services Examination.

name: Pathology Residency Course
description: Get full access to India’s most comprehensive pathology learning app — designed for MD/DNB residents and aspirants of NEET SS & FRCPath.

name: GS Foundation Course
description: The General Studies Foundation Course is designed to build a strong base for UPSC aspirants covering key subjects like History, Polity, Geography, Economy, and Environment. It is ideal for both beginners and repeaters aiming to master the core syllabus.

name: Ethics and Integrity Course
description: This course provides deep insights into ethical theories, case studies, and values required for UPSC GS Paper IV. Focuses on practical application of integrity, honesty, and public service ethics.

name: Polity Mastery Course
description: Comprehensive course covering Indian Polity with reference to the Constitution, governance, and legal frameworks.

name: Economy and Finance Course
description: This course covers Indian Economy basics, current affairs, and financial concepts important for Prelims and Mains with visual explanations and real-world relevance.

name: Geography Optional Course
description: An optional course focusing on Physical, Human, and Indian Geography for UPSC Mains Paper I & II. Includes map practice, model answers, and personalized feedback.

name: Environment and Ecology Crash Course
description: Quick revision program for Environment and Ecology with current affairs integration and PYQ mapping.
